itemInfo.itemDesc:
Soup made with meat. 
- Unique effect: Critical Hit Rate +1 for 30 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Cream
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be created by Shaking sugar with the milk obtained from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fruit Pie, Fish Soup, etc.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
